plot: Denmark has one of the world's highest educated populations, yet the belief in spiritual worlds, astrology, the occult, and swings of a pendulum grows. But how easily can we fooled?
title: Fornemmelse for snyd
plot_es: Denmark has one of the world's highest educated populations, yet the belief in spiritual worlds, astrology, the occult, and swings of a pendulum grows. But how easily can we fooled?
plot_en: Denmark has one of the world's highest educated populations, yet the belief in spiritual worlds, astrology, the occult, and swings of a pendulum grows. But how easily can we fooled?
